BR_text.BRsummary: Decoder updates on property mode breaks caps-negotiation.
BR_text.BRdescription:
Set Mode=direct_video
 Do caps-nego
 Stop
 Set Mode=image_labeling
 Do caps-nego
 ==> FAIL. text/x-raw doesn't show up.

comments_0.comment_text:
: Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/827>#827</denchmark-link>
 . The person in charge will reply soon.

comments_5.comment_text: It looks like... tensor_fitler cannot reconfigure itself once something is set, even if the reconfiguring setting is EXACTLY same as before, it becomes.. "NULL" (model_path).
